stripped_text: Install Sub Boost on a rezzed piece of ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Host ice gains barrier and 'Subroutine End the run.' after all its other subroutines."
text: Install Sub Boost on a rezzed piece of ice as a hosted condition counter with the text "Host ice gains barrier and '[subroutine] End the run.' after all its other subroutines."
title: Sub Boost
